titleStmt.title: The vvounds of ciuill vvar Liuely set forth in the true tragedies of Marius and Scilla. As it hath beene publiquely plaide in London, by the Right Honourable the Lord high Admirall his Seruants. VVritten by Thomas Lodge Gent.
titleStmt.author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter, and are to be sold [by A. Kitson or R. Bankworth] at the signe of the Sunne in Paules Church-yarde,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The true tragedies of Marius and Scilla.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sunne in Paules Church-yarde
